property.description: Property sheet to hold XML specification for forms for configurations

property.value:

Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.
--> <editor> <formElement> <type>entry</type> <label>Configuration Name:</label> <property>config</property> <value></value> <required>1</required> <documentation>Provide a unique name for the configuration, keeping in mind that you may need to create additional configurations over time.</documentation> </formElement> <formElement> <type>entry</type> <label>Description:</label> <property>desc</property> <value>HelloWorld configuration</value> <documentation>Provide a simple description for this configuration.</documentation> </formElement> <formElement> <type>select</type> <label>Level of formality:</label> <property>formalLevel</property> <value>Informal</value> <documentation>Level of formality to use</documentation> <required>1</required> <option> <name>Surfer</name> <value>Surfer</value> </option> <option> <name>Informal</name> <value>Informal</value> </option> <option> <name>Almost Formal</name> <value>Almost Formal</value> </option> </formElement> </editor>

formalParameter.description: the name of the configuration to use
